title: Psycho
description: A horror-thriller about a young woman who is murdered in a motel after stealing money from her employer.

title: Rear Window
description: A thriller-drama about a wheelchair-bound photographer spying on his neighbors, suspecting one of them has committed murder.

title: The Birds
description: A horror-thriller about a series of sudden, unexplained bird attacks.

title: Vertigo
description: A psychological thriller-drama about a retired police detective who becomes obsessed with a mysterious woman.

title: North by Northwest
description: A thriller-drama about a New York City advertising executive who is mistaken for a spy.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: A thriller-drama about two strangers who meet on a train and plan to commit each other's murders.

title: Dial M for Murder
description: A thriller-drama about a retired tennis pro who hatches a plan to kill his wife.

title: Oppenheimer
description: Christopher Nolan's latest epic film about J. Walter Oppenheimer and the creation of the atomic bomb.

title: Interstellar
description: A space exploration film that follows a group of astronauts as they travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: Inception
description: A heist film set in a dream world where a team of thieves must infiltrate a target's subconscious and steal their secrets.

title: The Dark Knight
description: The second installment in Nolan's Batman trilogy, where Batman faces off against his greatest nemesis, the Joker.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
description: The final installment in Nolan's Batman trilogy, where Batman must confront his greatest enemy and save Gotham City from destruction.

title: Batman Begins
description: The first installment in Nolan's Batman trilogy, where Bruce Wayne must confront his past and become the hero Gotham needs.

title: Dunkirk
description: A war film set during the evacuation of Dunkirk during World War II, where a group of soldiers must fight for their survival.

title: The Prestige
description: A film about two rival magicians in the late 19th century who will stop at nothing to outdo each other and become the best in the business.
